```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read-in-data}
fp <- "../output/results.csv"
df <- read.csv(fp)
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  mutate(id_=paste0(id,"-", sim_number)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=round, y=that_rate, col=as.factor(id_))) +
    geom_line() +
    ylim(0, 1) +
    theme_classic()
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  mutate(id_=paste0(id,"-", sim_number)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=round, y=r, col=as.factor(id_))) +
    geom_line() +
    ylim(0, 1) +
    theme_classic()
```
